text: Era yakkiriza okwenenya kw'abasatu abo abataagenda ku lutabaalo okutuusa ensi lwe yabafundirira awamu n'obugazi bwayo, nabo bennyini nebafunda olw'okweraliikirira, nebatuuka okulowooza nti tewali kuwona Katonda okugyako nga omuntu azze gyali, oluvanyuma Katonda yabaddiramu basobole okwenenya. Anti mazima Katonda yye akkiriza okwenenya musaasizi
